name: Dutch Dash
description:
When the dams have broken, there's only one way to escape the gushing waves that are flooding the land. 
So put on your clogs and run your way to freedom in Dutch Dash!
Or like us Dutchies say: STOMPEN MET DIE KLOMPEN!

Features

 Run endlessly in a gorgeous low poly world with a Dutch theme.
 Jump and dodge your way out of various obstacles. 
 Collect licorice coins and crazy powerups to increase your score.
 Compare your highscores with your friends on the leaderboard.

Controls

 Switching lanes: Arrow keys left and right / A and D
 Jumping: Arrow key up / W / Spacebar

Since we are still working on developing our game, it would be much appreciated if you could fill out this feedback form after playing!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdf8FwouQZ6_RTSXnrd3TeTjTykY8jPinMjnICB...
